module.name: spamassassin
module.summary: Filter used for removing unsolicited email.

template.name: spamassassin_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the spamassassin module.

desc.p: The per role template for the spamassassin module.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

interface.name: spamassassin_exec
interface.summary: Execute the standalone spamassassin program in the caller directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: spamassassin_exec_spamd
interface.summary: Execute the spamassassin daemon program in the caller directory.
